Container.Name: PS3NetSrv
Container.Overview: PS3netsrv is a program that allows Multiman or Webman to play game backups that are stored on your unRAID server. [span style='color: #E80000;']THIS IS IN BETA AND HAS REPORTED ISSUES with UNRAID 6.8.0 and higher.[/span][br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/games[/b] This is where your games should be stored.[br] Port [b]38008[/b]/tcp is default for PS3NetSrv.[br] Submit any UnRaid issues here: [url]http://lime-technology.com/forum/index.php?topic=48370.0[/url][br] The docker container is made by [span style='color: #E80000;']shawly[/span]/ps3netsrv

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Container.Description: PS3netsrv is a program that allows Multiman or Webman to play game backups that are stored on your unRAID server.
